description:
Science Game With Water Experiment Pro.

Well come to Science Game With Water Experiment Pro.

If you're looking for some fun with science experiments then you've come to the correct place.

You'll find a lot of experiments can be done using simple ingredients found around your house (with adult supervision of course). 

While playing, kids will be guided step by step. After completing an experiment the results and conclusions will be presented for kids learning & assistance.

Kids like to learn cooking in kitchen like a chef but learning science is also very important for little boys and girls. 

Experiments 

1. We will learn how we can make water glow in the dark.
2. We will learn how the water travels through the paper towel.
3. Let's do an experiment with cold water and hot water.
4. Let's see how electricity can be generated from salt water.
5. we will learn to change the colour of the flower.
6. Let's see how light transfer through water.
7. we learn how we can stop falling of water from holes of a bottle.
8. We will learn to create a rainbow effect with water.
9. We gonna learn how the flower takes up the different colors.
10. we're gonna learn how the water from the plate goes in the glass.


Science Game With Water Experiment Game Features

- We provide a logic for kids. Make experiment with logic and made your own experiment.
- All the experiments are very easy to understand and perform anywhere.
- Share your experiments to your friends.


So if you like this kind of games, this new Unique Games is made for you!

Come try it now and share it with your friends!
